survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric bicycle commuters to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and areas for improvement in urban commuting.

questions.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use an electric bicycle for commuting?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using an electric bicycle for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using an electric bicycle for commuting?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your electric bicycle?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face while commuting with an electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face while commuting with an electric bicycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would enhance your electric bicycle commuting experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would enhance your electric bicycle commuting experience?
